abstract.p: Mack-Cali Realty Corp signs new leases with Esperya USA, J T Lynn Representatives and Wald Optics Laboratory at office park in Elmsford, NY, and with Physicians' Telecom and Evonyx at office park in Hawthorne (S)

block.p: Mack-Cali Realty Corporation has signed five leases at its office parks in Elmsford and Hawthorne. At Cross-Westchester Executive Park in Elmsford, new tenants include Esperya U.S.A., a distributor of food and wine products; J. T. Lynn Representatives, a plumbing supply house, which relocated from Long Island; and Wald Optics Laboratory, a precision optics company, which moved from Pleasantville.

Mack-Cali Realty Corporation has signed five leases at its office parks in Elmsford and Hawthorne. At Cross-Westchester Executive Park in Elmsford, new tenants include Esperya U.S.A., a distributor of food and wine products; J. T. Lynn Representatives, a plumbing supply house, which relocated from Long Island; and Wald Optics Laboratory, a precision optics company, which moved from Pleasantville.

At Mid-Westchester Executive Park, with 12 buildings in Hawthorne, the new tenants are Physicians' Telecom, a clinical communications network company, and Evonyx, a subsidiary of an existing tenant, Reveo.
